awards.text: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 18 wins & 17 nominations.

fullplot: Three diverse characters, for the most part intellectually challenged, find a deserted plane with a bag full of millions of dollars inside. They devise a simple plan to keep the money if no-one claims it. Ofcourse, nothing turns out simple...
plot: When three blue collar acquaintances come across millions of dollars in lost cash they make a plan to keep their find from the authorities but find complications and mistrust weaving its way into their plan.
title: A Simple Plan

tomatoes.consensus: A riveting crime thriller full of emotional tension.
